name: josh-wentworth-portfolio
description: Josh Wentworth - Multidisciplinary engineer portfolio featuring software, hardware, and fabrication projects
author: Josh Wentworth

scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:production
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m "chore: bump version to %s"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m "chore: bump version to %s"
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m "chore: bump version to %s"
